Common package¶

A package of common utilities that use in different modules of the project.

Script decos.py¶

The decorator writes information about the launched function to the log.

Script descriptors.py¶

class common.descriptors.CheckPort¶

Port validation descriptor.

class common.descriptors.CheckIP¶

Address validation descriptor.

class common.descriptors.CheckName¶

Username validation descriptor.

Script errors.py¶

class common.errors.ServerError(text)¶

Create error server with text

class common.errors.IncorrectDataNotDictError¶

Create error wen data not dict

class common.errors.IncorrectCodeError(wrong_code)¶

Create error wen invalid code in message

Script metaclasses.py¶

class common.metaclasses.ServerCreator(name_class, bases_classes, dict_class)¶
class common.metaclasses.ClientCreator(name_class, bases_classes, dict_class)¶

Script utils.py¶

common.utils. get_msg (client)

The function of receiving messages from remote computers. Accepts JSON messages, decode the received message and verifies that the dictionary is received.

common.utils. send_msg (sock, message)

The function of sending dictionaries via a socket. Encodes a dictionary in JSON format and sends through a socket.

Script variables.py¶

Contains various global project variables.

Mega Messenger
